scripts.asbuild:web: asc src/main.ts -o ./dist/gpsgsv.wasm -t build/gpsgsv.wat -b build/gpsgsv.d.ts --runtime minimal --exportRuntime --lowMemoryLimit 32767 --use Math=NativeMathf -O3 --optimize
scripts.asbuild:wasm3: asc src/main.ts -o ../../resources/wasm/gpsgsv.wasm -t build/gpsgsv.wat -b build/gpsgsv.d.ts --runtime minimal --exportRuntime --lowMemoryLimit 32767 --use Math=NativeMathf -O3 --optimize
